name: Wanderlust Explorer
description: Embark on a journey of comfort and style with our signature Wanderlust Explorer tee. Crafted from ultra-soft 280 GSM cotton, this oversized masterpiece features a bold adventure-inspired print that speaks to the free-spirited soul. Drop-shoulder design ensures maximum comfort while making a statement. Perfect for travel, casual hangouts, or layering. Wash after wash, the print stays vibrant and fabric stays buttery soft.

name: Minimal Dreams
description: Less is more. Introducing Minimal Dreams — where simplicity meets sophistication. This pristine white tee features a subtle yet powerful typography print that resonates with dreamers and doers. Made from breathable cotton with a perfect regular fit, it's your go-to piece for clean, effortless style. Pair it with anything — it elevates everything.

name: Black Oversized Drop
description: The ultimate black oversized tee every wardrobe needs. Made from premium heavy-weight cotton that feels luxurious against the skin. Features dropped shoulders, ribbed neckline, and a relaxed silhouette that screams confidence. This isn't just a t-shirt — it's a statement piece that pairs perfectly with everything from joggers to denim.

name: Floral Whisper
description: Bloom in style with Floral Whisper — a delicate fusion of feminine grace and modern comfort. This soft pink oversized tee features hand-drawn floral artwork that whispers elegance. Perfect length for front-tuck or full coverage. Made for the woman who believes comfort should never compromise beauty.

name: Classic White
description: The timeless classic that never goes out of style. Our Classic White tee is made from premium ring-spun cotton that gets softer with every wash. Perfect weight — not too thin, not too thick. The foundation of every great outfit. Stock up — you'll live in these.

name: Navy Denim Verse
description: For the denim lovers who live in oversized comfort. This deep navy tee features a vintage-inspired denim typography print that captures the essence of rebellion and freedom. Heavy cotton construction with raw-edge details. Pair with ripped jeans for the ultimate cool-kid look.

name: Retro Vibes Only
description: Take a trip back in time with Retro Vibes Only. This bold black oversized tee features vintage cassette and vinyl graphics that celebrate the golden era of music. Made for those who believe the best vibes come from analog hearts in a digital world.

name: Oversized Grey Cloud
description: Float through your day in the ultimate comfort of our Grey Cloud oversized tee. Made from premium French terry cotton that feels like wearing a hug. Perfect heather grey shade that goes with literally everything. This is cloud nine comfort, redefined.

name: Red Fire Text
description: Ignite your style with this bold red statement tee. Features fiery typography that demands attention. Made from breathable cotton with a perfect regular fit. For those who don't just wear clothes — they make statements.

name: Butterfly Soul (Women)
description: Let your soul take flight with Butterfly Soul — a delicate celebration of transformation and freedom. This women's oversized tee features ethereal butterfly artwork on pristine white cotton. Perfect for dreamers, healers, and free spirits.

name: Plain Black Essential
description: The little black tee that does everything. Made from premium cotton that feels luxurious yet durable. Perfect weight, perfect fit, perfect black that doesn't fade. Your wardrobe's best friend.

name: Midnight Blue Oversized
description: Dive into the depths of comfort with our Midnight Blue oversized masterpiece. Rich navy shade that elevates any look. Made from heavy-weight cotton with perfect drape. For nights that turn into mornings and comfort that never compromises style.

name: Stay Wild Moon Child
description: For the moon children who dance with wolves and talk to stars. This mystical black tee features celestial artwork and 'Stay Wild Moon Child' script. Made for those who follow the moon's rhythm and live by their own rules.

name: Lavender Dreams (Women)
description: Drift into lavender fields with this dreamy women's oversized tee. Soft lavender shade with delicate floral details. Made from cloud-like cotton that feels like a hug. Perfect for lazy Sundays and magical moments.

name: Be The Change
description: Wear your values. This powerful white tee features the iconic 'Be The Change' message in bold typography. Made from soft, breathable cotton. A reminder that the revolution starts with you — and your wardrobe.

name: Forest Green Simple
description: Connect with nature in this rich forest green essential tee. Made from pure cotton that feels as good as it looks. The perfect shade of green that reminds you to breathe deep and stay grounded.

name: Tokyo Streets
description: Get lost in the neon lights and endless energy of Tokyo with this streetwear masterpiece. Features Japanese typography and cyberpunk aesthetic. Made for urban explorers and night owls who thrive in the chaos of city lights.

name: White Oversized Premium
description: The white oversized tee redefined. Made from premium heavy-weight cotton with perfect drape and structure. Clean, minimalist, luxurious. This is the white tee you've been searching for — the one that makes everything look better.

name: Sunset Chaser (Women)
description: Chase golden hours in this warm sunset orange tee. Features gradient artwork that captures the magic of dusk. Made for women who live for golden hour, road trips, and moments that take your breath away.

name: Coffee & Chaos
description: For those whose blood type is coffee positive. This rich brown tee celebrates the beautiful chaos of caffeine-fueled lives. Perfect for coffee addicts, night owls, and anyone who thrives in organized chaos.

name: Plain Navy
description: The navy essential that goes with everything. Rich, deep color that doesn't fade. Made from soft cotton that's perfect for layering or wearing solo. Your wardrobe's most reliable player.

name: Lost in Music
description: When words fail, music speaks. This oversized black tee features vintage headphones and waveform graphics for the true audiophiles. Made for those who find their peace in melodies and their home in rhythm.

name: Pink Cloud Oversized
description: Live in a world of cotton candy dreams with our Pink Cloud oversized tee. Soft bubblegum pink shade made from premium French terry cotton. This is what walking on clouds feels like.

name: Good Vibes Only (Women)
description: Radiate positivity in this sunshine yellow women's tee. Features 'Good Vibes Only' script with floral accents. Made for women who choose joy, spread light, and believe in the power of good energy.

name: Born to Ride
description: For the rebels with or without a cause. This bold black tee features distressed 'Born to Ride' typography. Made from heavy cotton that can handle the open road and late nights. Freedom isn't just a feeling — it's a lifestyle.

name: Plain Red
description: Make a statement without saying a word. This bold red essential tee demands attention. Made from soft cotton in a perfect true red shade that doesn't fade. For those who were born to stand out.

name: Starry Night Oversized
description: Sleep under the stars, wear them too. This midnight navy oversized tee features a breathtaking constellation print across the chest. Made from premium heavy cotton with glow-in-the-dark details. For stargazers and dreamers.

name: Free Spirit (Women)
description: For the women who dance to their own rhythm. This flowing white tee features 'Free Spirit' script with feather artwork. Made from breathable cotton perfect for movement and freedom. Untamed hearts only.

name: No Rules Just Vibes
description: Break the rules, keep the vibes. This bold black women's oversized tee features graffiti-style 'No Rules Just Vibes' artwork. Made for rebels, dreamers, and those who write their own story.

name: Charcoal Grey Simple
description: The perfect charcoal grey that completes any look. Made from premium cotton with a heather finish that adds depth and character. Versatile, comfortable, and effortlessly cool — just like you.
